name: Animo Runner
description:
Controls

Spacebar: Jump

Left and Right Arrow Keys: Move through the items to replace them.

You are the only living creature in this endless runner, where you have to run from an evil entity.

You can get the help of  other ghosts that you find along the way, 

There are 3 types of generous ghosts, the ones that knocks back the enemy, the ones that set the enemy in flames, and the one that locks the enemy in place and grants you wings.

Grab 4 of the same type of ghosts to generate one of those habilities in order to help you keep running.
